Impact Atlas gives you everything you need to execute a best-in-class Graduation program

Impact Atlas is a complete monitoring and evaluation, project management and reporting platform for Graduation programs. It will enable the entire global community of implementers, donors and researchers to transform data into information, and use that information to fuel powerful decision-making.

Impact Atlas will be available in late 2016. To stay informed, sign up today.

Impact Atlas is fully customizable and drives efficiency, increases transparency and helps organizations be responsive at every level of a Graduation program. It features users to:

Real-time mobile data collection to:

  • Collect field data without internet connectivity and at a lower cost
  • Deploy complex surveys, messages, alerts and reports
  • Link to other systems, offering potential for intra-agency coordination

Data visualizations that will:

  • Track beneficiary-level indicators across multiple graduation milestones
  • Show interactive visualizations that provide meaning insights on collected data â€¨
  • Create unique dashboards for different roles within the organizational hierarchy

Reporting and project management to:

  • Track performance of branch offices and field staff
  • Visualize data aggregated by regions, programs or country
  • Generate reports on real-time data

Impact Atlas is a central part of Uplift, a collaborative initiative to end extreme poverty by 2030.

Through a combination of capital mobilization, tech innovation, learning and exchange, Uplift works with investors and leading cross-sector partners to remove the barriers to collaboration and scale Graduation worldwide.
